title: -Zmeta-stats ICE: with thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Os { code: 5, kind: PermissionDenied, message: "Access is denied." }

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
`-Zmeta-stats` started ICEing between nightly-2022-07-15 and nightly-2022-07-16, looking at diff https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/compare/c2f428d2f3340a0e7d995f4726223db91b93704c...23e21bdd25026e2839ebe946c2a937c1904887d2 it's probably https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/96544, so @m-ysk ? ### Code ``` cargo new --lib hello cd hello RUSTFLAGS="-Zmeta-stats" cargo build ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (e1b28cd2f 2022-08-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: e1b28cd2f16bd5b832183d7968cae3bb9213e78d commit-date: 2022-08-19 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.65.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Os { code: 5, kind: PermissionDenied, message: "Access is denied." }', compiler\rustc_metadata\src\rmeta\encoder.rs:774:22 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fffb7e59982 - ::fmt::h6af6f9f3a4c35d3a 1: 0x7fffb7e94c8b - core::fmt::write::he3f07bcff4ed6652 2: 0x7fffb7e4c48a - ::fmt::hf6257fd727ae80d5 3: 0x7fffb7e5d254 - std::panicking::default_hook::hb6687dad6f786ea1 4: 0x7fffb7e5ce8a - std::panicking::default_hook::hb6687dad6f786ea1 5: 0x7fff99b8a9f2 - rustc_driver[1d98c199491bd8cd]::describe_lints 6: 0x7fffb7e5dc52 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hf223e88fa60de009 7: 0x7fffb7e5d9dd - ::get::h230f1146d8ddd341 8: 0x7fffb7e5a67f - ::fmt::h6af6f9f3a4c35d3a 9: 0x7fffb7e5d6a0 - rust_begin_unwind 10: 0x7fffb7ec9f35 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::he533ea2e8c7ab1f5 11: 0x7fffb7eca0b3 - core::result::unwrap_failed::ha67da4e5ef765d0c 12: 0x7fff99665e50 - ::predicate_shorthands 13: 0x7fff980fc525 - rustc_metadata[24368a714c5ae756]::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 14: 0x7fff980fdd6c - ::emit_raw_bytes 15: 0x7fff980fba6e - rustc_metadata[24368a714c5ae756]::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 16: 0x7fff980f4711 - rustc_metadata[24368a714c5ae756]::fs::encode_and_write_metadata 17: 0x7fff974c3b0c - ::pre_expansion_lint 18: 0x7fff974b00dc - ::ongoing_codegen 19: 0x7fff97466c69 - 20: 0x7fff974630eb - 21: 0x7fff97486532 - 22: 0x7fff9749d727 - rustc_driver[1d98c199491bd8cd]::args::arg_expand_all 23: 0x7fff97466449 - 24: 0x7fff9748cbed - 25: 0x7fffb7e6e41c - std::sys::windows::thread::Thread::new::h5a05fdb6284bcf7c 26: 0x7ff800497034 - BaseThreadInitThunk 27: 0x7ff802e22651 - RtlUserThreadStart error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.65.0-nightly (e1b28cd2f 2022-08-19) running on x86_64-pc-windows-msvc note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -Z meta-stats ```
